text: Barwell is a small locality in the London Borough of Kingston upon Thames, located between Chessington and Claygate and historically in the county of Surrey.Willey, Russ. Chambers London Gazetter, p 26. It was traditionally farmland, its name likely alluding the barley that was grown in the area. Category:Areas of London Category:Districts of the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames
title: Barwell, London
